contact.aboutText: With over 20 years of experience, Exotique Nepal specializes in creating unforgettable journeys across Nepal, India, and Tibet. From breathtaking treks to rich cultural experiences, we craft travel moments that stay with you for a lifetime.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: Exotic Treks & Expeditions has been guiding adventurers through Nepal, Tibet, and India for over 20 years. Our team of local experts ensures safe, immersive, and sustainable journeys for travelers from around the world.
about.story: Founded in 1999 by a group of passionate local guides, Exotic Treks & Expeditions has grown into one of the most respected adventure travel companies in Nepal. With a deep-rooted connection to the Himalayas and the communities that live among them, our team is dedicated to providing authentic, safe, and sustainable trekking experiences.
about.goal: Our goal is to make every journey meaningful — not just for the travelers, but also for the local communities we work with. By promoting responsible tourism, we aim to preserve the breathtaking natural beauty of the region while uplifting the lives of the people who call it home.

testimonials.title: What Our Travelers Say
testimonials.feedback1: An amazing agency! Wonderful welcome in Kathmandu. Guides and staff do everything to meet your expectations at a very fair price. You feel like family when the trip ends, and you already want to come back!
testimonials.feedback2: A top French-speaking agency that bends over backward to satisfy loyal customers. We feel totally safe from airport arrival to departure—everything is organized to perfection.
testimonials.feedback3: Well-prepared tours, top-notch guides making sure you're comfortable and attentive to your needs. First experience for me, definitely not the last.
